normalized: 2 hours later…
the old church had burned down completely.
although the fire had been put out by the fire brigade, the scent ofsomething burning still lingers.
the perimeter around the ruined church is blocked off by police tape,preventing unauthorized access.
besides saying "off limits", the tape is also adorned with 5-pointedstars, commonly known as wards of the 'onmyo agency'.
in other words, this place now falls under the jurisdiction of thediviners.
not the police or the fire department.
therefore anyone, who crosses the tape receives mixes glares from thepolicemen and the onlookers.
the diviners hold more authority during mystic crimes, even allowingthem to keep the police off the scene.
after all, the policement are just ordinary humans without supernaturalpowers or abilities.
this is for their own safety.
everyone is currently glaring at towako, who is calmly standing insidethe perimiter.
such a young, beautiful woman shouldn't even be in this slum, letalone on a mystical crime scene.
she is even keeping her distance fromother diviners.
towako completely ignores the glares and calls over one of the staffmembers.

name: towako
normalized: rodrigo, what are your thoughts on this?
the man looks over at her and shakes his head.

name: rodrigo
normalized: no clues yet, but there are signs of various mystical techniquesbeing used.
i can feel it even without the aid of my spirit.

name: rodrigo
normalized: even if there was some energy residue left, i doubt we could followits trail.
sorry.

name: towako
normalized: i see.
rodrigo nakatomi, an old collegue of towako's, considers himself awoman.
this shows both in his manner of speech and orientation.
even'rodrigo' is but an alias.
his real name is tadayoshi nakatomi.

name: rodrigo
normalized: just a moment, please.
red tongue 'akaname', here boy!
at rodrigo's call something pink appears from the charred ruins.
the crowd of the onlookers murmurs at the sight of the strange object.
it is…a tongue!
a huge, humanoid tongue -as if cut from a giant'smouth- is slithering towards the man.
this is rodrigo's spirit, akaname.

name: rodrigo
normalized: good boy♪
he pats the huge tongue like a puppy on the head.
the spirit disappears in smoke, leaving only a paper doll behind.

name: towako
normalized: sorry, this is all because i lowered my guard.
but if you can atleast preserve the site somewhat, maybe you'll find some kind of aclue.
towako looks at the ruins of the burned church in chagrin.

name: towako
normalized: damn it…
she bites her lip and clenches her fists.

name: rodrigo
normalized: did i hear it right?
today must be a special day if towako caresabout the state of a crime scene so much.
but the girl remains silent after rodrigo's joke.
it is like herwhole complexion is saying "it can't be helped".

name: rodrigo
normalized: well, regardless, my akaname will track that runaway, creepy hagyuyami.

name: rodrigo
normalized: and to think she revived after having her head blown off.
what afreak, right?

name: towako
normalized: i'll kill her next time.
fo' sho!
towako grits her teeth so hard, that blood drips from her mouth.

name: rodrigo
normalized: whoa, easy there!
knock that off!
a woman shouldn't grit her teethtill she bleeds!
that'll ruin that pretty face of yours!
rodrigo pulls out a fancy hankerchief and carefully wipes out towako'smouth.

name: towako
normalized: sorry.

name: rodrigo
normalized: no you're not.
you've always been like that.

name: rodrigo
normalized: but at least your fashion sense improved after joining 'onmyo agency'.
you look good.
but the make-up, hmm…i'd give that 70 points.
towako's facial expression softens slightly from this sudden fashioncheck.

name: towako
normalized: heh, and you don't change at all, rodrigo.

name: rodrigo
normalized: that's the result of aging well and plenty of loo~ve.
have you been in love yet, towako?

name: towako
normalized: no time for that.
the girl pouts.

name: rodrigo
normalized: wai!
what a scary look!
why so serious?
smile.
rodrigo points his fingers at the edges of towako's mouth and triesto force a smile on her face.

name: towako
normalized: don't feel like it.
she swats his hands away.

name: rodrigo
normalized: then force yourself to smile, even if you don't feel like it.
that's what good girls do.

name: rodrigo
normalized: pull yourself together, towako!
it is still unconfirmed that sakurais dead.
don't believe everything this yuyami says, you hear?

name: rodrigo
normalized: would the sakura you admire die so easily?
i don't think so.

name: towako
normalized: you're right.
we still don't know it for sure.
towako nods at the encouraging words.
the entrails at the altar already burned to cinders, so there's noknowing if sakura yuko was truly among them.
sure, she went missing on a mission to subjugate yuyami, but yuko wasa far more experienced diviner than towako.
it is unthinkable that shewould perish so easily, even considering yuyami's regeneration.

name: rodrigo
normalized: look, don't make such a scary face.
these are competent people,we'll find you a clue.

name: towako
normalized: yeah, please do, rodrigo.

name: rodrigo
normalized: leave it to us!
towako finally smiles.

name: rodrigo
normalized: waah, towako is so cute when she's smiling!
it makes me want tokiss you!
rodrigo suddenly clings to the girl in an attempt to kiss her.

name: towako
normalized: hey, yo, easy there!
you're more into men, aren't you?
towako yells while twisting her body away from the prying lips.

name: rodrigo
normalized: what are you saying?
this is just friendly physical contact betweenus ladies.

name: towako
normalized: the heck it is?!
stop confusing me with your kisses and get back towork!
and be quick about it!
rodrigo laughs and releases the screaming girl.

name: rodrigo
normalized: embarrassed already…but i really should get back to work.
a dashingyoung man suddenly appeared on the scene♪
rodrigo winks at towako and turns around.

name: towako
normalized: huh?
ooh, manager?
the girl's eyes shift towards a person who just got out of the blackmercedez.
it was the general manager of the main branch of 'onmyoagency' and its r&d department, koso abe.
he's a genious diviner from a distinguished family and also thesecretary of the current head of the 'agency', ryumei abe.
as a legitimate child of the director, there's no doubt he'll sooninherit this position.
he possesses the spirit of manipulation, 'doppelganger'.
they say this spirit is 1 of the 72 dukes of hell, capable ofdiscerning truth from lies.

name: koso
normalized: i got held up.
heard the story, more or less.
it's weird.
that's the first thing he says to towako after passing under the tape.

name: towako
normalized: i'll get her next time.
chief, am i still on this case?
the girl looks directly at koso.

name: koso
normalized: of course.
i think you may be the only diviner capable of taking herdown.
you have our permission to do what needs to be done.

name: rodrigo
normalized: like venturing into dangerous places?
koso smiles wryly at rodrigo's remark.

name: koso
normalized: indeed.
sorry to ask this of you.

name: towako
normalized: you're too kind, chief.
towako smiles fearlessly.

name: koso
normalized: the 'onmyo agency' will also investigate what we can.
we'll stay intouch if we have something to report.

name: towako
normalized: yeah, please do.
towako turns on her heels and ducks under the tape.

name: koso
normalized: what about your wound?
should the medics take a look at it?
koso asks.
there is still blood on towako's back from yuyami's wound.
the girl only waves her hand as if saying 'no need' and disappearsfrom the scene.
10 minutes later.
towako finds herself in the largest red-lights district of the city.
she has an old friend here: the current boss of the mafia that rulesthese parts.
the mafia boss, kondo isamu, is in the middle of negotiations withthe members of chamber of commerce, a few lawyers and a pair ofrussian arms dealers.
suddenly, they hear a commotion outside the room.

name: man's voice
normalized: oi, missy!
don't disturb the boss during a meetin-geh!
*wham!

name: another man's voice
normalized: if you don't stop now, lass, i-buegh!
*smash!
it sounds like someone is smashing the furniture and breaking thewindows.
the guards beg, scream, groan and then…silence.

name: lawyer
normalized: boss…

name: kondo
normalized: sorry for the mess.
yo, tell the russians to get out.
kondo apparently realized what is going on and orders his man.

name: lawyer
normalized: yes, sir.
the lawyer turns to the panicking russians and tells them"sorry about this.
let us continue our talk at a later time".
but obviously after coming such a long way, the arms dealers are noteasily convinced and start yelling in russian.

name: kondo
normalized: yo, if you value your life, you'd better back off from the door.
or else-
*smash!
the room's door is blown off its hinges, interrupting kondo's speech.
it slams into the opposite wall, sending the russians' guards flying.

name: kondo
normalized: oh well.
come on in, already.
kondo lets out a sigh.
the butcher of doors is none other than towako.

name: towako
normalized: aah, there you are, issy!

name: kondo
normalized: gents, meet tow-wy.
what a pleasant surprise.
and could you open thedoor normally next time?
towako tosses away two machine guns she confiscated from the guards,both of their barrels bent in an odd shape.
the russians point at her and scream something.

name: towako
normalized: what's that foreigner saying?
should i just off him?
the girl asks calmly.

name: kondo
normalized: oh, hold on, they were just leaving.
kondo motions to the lawyer, who is attempting to calm the panickingpeople and have them leave the room.
other subordinates drag out theguards that got kicked against the walls.

name: towako
normalized: what's their deal?
towako asks as if it was a trivial matter.

name: kondo
normalized: meh, just a customer.
not important enough to make little tow-wywait.

name: towako
normalized: but issy's goons were getting in my way too.
i was holding back,though.

name: kondo
normalized: my apologies, i have a lot of them just wandering around.
anyway, since you're here, do you require information from 'ourside'?
towako nods.

name: towako
normalized: tell me where to find that damn hag yuyami.

name: kondo
normalized: yuyami?
do you mean the woman involved with the triads?

name: towako
normalized: that's the piece of crap i'm talking about.
that snake!
i won't restuntil i've chopped her to pieces!
towako slams her right fist into the palm of her left hand.
kondo freezes up from the sound, imagining a person's skull beingcrushed between her hands.

name: kondo
normalized: yo, chill out, towako.
i can't just say 'leave it to me' andmiraculously conjure up an address.

name: kondo
normalized: i don't know where that yuyami was born or raised.
plus she must bea diviner just like you?
finding such person won't be easy-

name: towako
normalized: huh?!
kondo shuts up just from one word.

name: towako
normalized: are you putting me on the same level as that piece of crap？

name: kondo
normalized: huh?
oh, no that's not what i meant.
long story short, finding thisyuyami won't be easy.
kondo quickly covers up, beads of sweat appearing on his forehead.

name: kondo
normalized: p-plus, everytime you come with a request, the most i get in returnis "thanks".
you getting my drift?
well, i do owe your dead father adebt i can never repay, but still…

name: kondo
normalized: i-i hope you understand my point of view.
a li-little gratitude fromtow-wy would be nice…
kondo barely finishes his monologue, something he was meaning tosay a long time ago.
his subordinates look at him as if saying 'you rock, boss!
well…
